docs.text: Welcome to Mvaya Mvaya (Brand Holding of Mvaya Ventures Pvt. Ltd.) is a new age Ed-Tech platform that aggregates all Online and Offline education stakeholders in the education ecospace. Different stakeholders at Mvaya are as follows – Students Educational Institutes Schools Colleges (Graduate + Post Graduate) Coaching Classes Online Ed Platforms Educators / Teachers / Mentors Parents Mvaya is artificial intelligence based machine learning student mentor to set a right career path for life. Right from the inception of students career track until the time a student scores the first job, Mvaya is his / her companion. For educational institutes and educators (Teachers / Mentors) Mvaya works as a platform for all business operations and internal management system.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Mvaya Auth APIs Login Endpoint - ​/auth​/user​/login​/ Request Param { "username": "darshan", "password": "@dmin!23" } Response Param (Successful) { "data": { "token": { "refresh": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoicmVmcmVzaCIsImV4cCI6MTU4NzkxODMwNiwianRpIjoiNTBhMjQyMTY1ZDBkNDFjZjk1YmM2OWZiODg1YWZmMzMiLCJ1c2VyX2lkIjozfQ.BVeGLEnm7_NeqSpW0RikQ18GNhjL61oXEa80mtTY8YM", "access": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoiYWNjZXNzIiwiZXhwIjoxNTg3NDg2MzA2LCJqdGkiOiJmNDRkZDkyYWE5ZjY0NDNmOThmNmJiYzY1MDI5MDBhOCIsInVzZXJfaWQiOjN9.WzsFalSeJlD8zMqtM6YhV4XD9BferiSs7Vh1xVGyNEw" }, "user": { "id": 3, "avatar": null, "gender_str": "", "access": null, "groups": [], "last_login": null, "username": "darshan", "first_name": "", "last_name": "", "email": "", "is_active": true, "date_joined": "2020-04-16T21:42:37", "phone": "", "gender": "" } } }
docs.title: Authentication

docs.text: User Onboarding - Student Student Register Endpoint - POST ​/auth​/user​/register/ Request Schema { "password": 1234, "username": "stri22ng2", "first_name": "string", "last_name": "string", "email": "user@ex2ample.com", "phone": "string", "address": [ { "line_1": "string", "line_2": "string", "landmark": "string", "city": "string", "zipcode": "string", "primary": true, "state": "Maharashtra", "country": "India" } ], "student_profile": { "board_id": 1, "grade_id": 1, "title": "string", "dob": "2020-04-20" }, "guardian": [ { "first_name": "string", "last_name": "string", "phone_primary": "string", "phone_secondary": "string", "email": "string", "relationship": 1 } ] } Response Schema (Successful) { "data": { "id": 47, "address": [ { "id": 1, "user_type": 1, "line_1": "string", "line_2": "string", "landmark": "string", "city": "string", "state": "Maharashtra", "country": "India", "zipcode": "string", "primary": true } ], "student_profile": { "id": 1, "board": { "id": 1, "title": "SSC" }, "grade": { "id": 1, "title": "8" }, "title": "string", "dob": "2020-04-20" }, "guardian": [ { "id": 1, "first_name": "string", "last_name": "string", "relationship": 1, "phone_primary": "string", "phone_secondary": "string", "email": "string" } ], "email": "user@ex2ample.com", "phone": "string", "user_type_char": "Student", "complete_name": "string string", "code": { "id": 14, "user": 47, "code": 148837 }, "last_login": null, "username": "stri22ng2", "first_name": "string", "last_name": "string", "is_active": true, "date_joined": "2020-04-29T20:53:55.944338", "user_type": 1, "gender": "", "verified": null } } Check for unique email Endpoint - POST ​/auth/user/unique_email_check/ Request Schema { "email": "user@example.com" } Response Schema (Successful) Empty response - 200 OK Response Schema (Error) { "error": { "message": "Error in 1 fields.", "status": 400, "error": "Fields error", "error_code": 21, "description": "Fields error.", "fields": [ { "field": "email", "message": [ "Seems like this email is already associated with an account." ] } ] } } Check for unique phone number Endpoint - POST /auth/user/unique_phone_check/ Request Schema { "phone": "9876543220" } Response Schema (Successful) Empty response - 200 OK Response Schema (Error) { "error": { "message": "Error in 1 fields.", "status": 400, "error": "Fields error", "error_code": 21, "description": "Fields error.", "fields": [ { "field": "phone", "message": [ "Seems like this phone number is already associated with an account." ] } ] } } Failed Registration Check Endpoint - POST ​/auth​/user​/register/ Request Schema Response Schema (Successful) Response Schema (Error) Verify OTP Endpoint - POST ​/auth​/user​/register/ Request Schema Response Schema (Successful) Response Schema (Error) Resend OTP Endpoint - POST ​/auth​/user​/register/ Request Schema Response Schema (Successful) Response Schema (Error)
